definition: A period of temporary cessation or interruption, typically used to take a break from an activity or to rest momentarily. It is commonly used in various contexts, such as in school or work settings, to refer to a short period of time when activities are temporarily halted.

examples.english: The school has a lunch break.

examples.german: Kannst du mir eine Pause geben?
examples.english: Can you give me a break?
